emptyScreen.title: No time off allocation has been added for {{year}}
emptyScreen.description: No allocations have been added yet. They will appear here once added

noLeaveError.title: Insufficient Balance
noLeaveError.description: You have no available balance for this time off type in the current year

allocationExpiredError.title: Allocation Expired
allocationExpiredError.description: Allocation for this time off type has expired

noSupervisorError.title: No supervisor has been assigned
noSupervisorError.description: Please contact the administrator regarding your request

errorTexts.commentAndAttachmentRequired: Please enter a comment and upload an attachment

leaveAppliedSuccess.title: Request Submitted
leaveAppliedSuccess.description: Your time off request has been successfully submitted for approval.

leaveAppliedError.title: Oops! Something went wrong
leaveAppliedError.description: Failed to submit the time off request. Please try again.

insufficientBalance.title: Insufficient Balance
insufficientBalance.description: Not enough balance to apply for time off on the selected date/s.

noLeaveEntitlement.title: No Time Off Entitlement
noLeaveEntitlement.description: You have no time off entitlements available for the selected date(s)

myLeaveRequests.emptyLeaveRequestDes: You haven't applied for any time off requests yet. Once you submit a request, it will be displayed here.
myLeaveRequests.nudgeSuccessDescription: Your supervisor has been notified about your time off request
myLeaveRequests.nudgeErrorDescription: Failed to nudge the supervisor. Please try again
myLeaveRequests.leaveCancelSuccessDescription: Time off request has been cancelled successfully.
myLeaveRequests.leaveCancelErrorDescription: Failed to cancel the leave. Please try again.
myLeaveRequests.confirmCancelDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel your leave request? Your supervisor will be informed upon confirmation.
myLeaveRequests.leaveRequestCancelledDescription: Your leave request was cancelled and your supervisor was informed.
myLeaveRequests.supervisorNudgedDescription: We sent a notification to your supervisor about your leave request. They’ll get back to you soon, we promise.

leaveTypes.title: Time Off Types
leaveTypes.activateLeaveTooltipText: Activate or inactivate the time off type, when inactivated, employees cannot request leaves of this type
leaveTypes.name: Time Off type name
leaveTypes.emojiTooltipText: Choose an emoji to quickly identify this time off type.
leaveTypes.leaveDurationPreferencesTooltip: Choose allowed time off durations: Half Day, Full Day, or both.
leaveTypes.halfDayDescription: Time off can be applied as morning half or evening half
leaveTypes.fullDayDescription: Time off can be applied for the full-day
leaveTypes.leaveTypeSettingsTooltip: Customize Time off type settings by enabling attachments, making them mandatory, and requiring comments.
leaveTypes.maximumCarryForwardDaysTooltip: Define the maximum balance (days) can be carried forward for this time off type
leaveTypes.carryForwardExpirationDateTooltip: Select the expiration date for carrying forward balances. Balances will be eligible for use until this selected date
leaveTypes.emptyLeaveTypeNameError: Please enter time off type name.
leaveTypes.uniqueLeaveTypeNameError: Time off type name already exists.
leaveTypes.emptyLeaveDurationError: Please select a time off duration preference for this time off type
leaveTypes.emptyMaxCarryForwardDaysError: Please enter maximum carry forward days.
leaveTypes.minCarryForwardExpirationDaysError: Please enter a value greater than 0.
leaveTypes.maxCarryForwardExpirationDaysError: Please enter a value less than 360.
leaveTypes.durationError: Please select a time off duration.
leaveTypes.editLeaveTypeErrorToastDescription: Failed to create time off type. Please try again.
leaveTypes.addLeaveTypeErrorToastDescription: Failed to update the time off type. Please try again.
leaveTypes.addLeaveTypeSuccessToastDescription: Time off type has been successfully created.
leaveTypes.editLeaveTypeSuccessToastDescription: The time off type has been successfully updated.
leaveTypes.activateLeaveTypeModalDescription: Activating this time off type will make entitlements allocated under it visible to employees. Would you like to proceed?
leaveTypes.inactivateLeaveTypeModalDescription: All time off entitlements for employees under this time off type will not be visible once inactivated. Remaining balances will be retained and will become visible again if you reactivate. Would you like to proceed?

customLeave.CustomLeaveAllocationTypeError: Please select a time off type
customLeave.invalidFractionPointError: Please enter a value that increments by 0.5
customLeave.validityPeriodTooltip: Add a value between 0.5 and 365. You can increase by 0.5
customLeave.requireNoOfDaysError: Please enter a number of days
customLeave.validNoOfDaysRangeError: Please enter a value between 0.5 and 365
customLeave.validNoOfDaysUpperRangeError: Please select a value less than 360
customLeave.validNoOfDaysLowerRangeError: Please enter a value of 0.5 or greater

emptySearchResult.description: No results found for the requested search query. Please retry.

emptyCustomLeaveScreen.title: No allocations available
emptyCustomLeaveScreen.description: No custom time off allocations have been added yet. Once you add allocations, they will be displayed here.

customLeave.deleteLeaveAllocationModalDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this time off allocation?
customLeave.unsavedChangesAddModalDes: You are about to leave your current task, and any unsaved changes will be lost. Do you wish to resume your task or leave anyway?
customLeave.customLeaveAllocationSuccessDes: Custom allocation has been successfully added.
customLeave.customLeaveAllocationFailDes: Failed to add the custom allocation. Please try again.
customLeave.editSuccessToastTitle: Custom allocation has been successfully updated.
customLeave.deleteSuccessDescription: Custom allocation has been deleted successfully.
customLeave.updateSuccessDescription: Custom allocation has been updated successfully.
customLeave.updateErrorDescription: The number of days cannot be lower than the used days.
customLeave.validNoOfDaysFullDayError: Selected time off type only allows full-day time offs
customLeave.validNoOfDaysIncrementError: Please enter a value in increments of 0.5
customLeave.fromDateMustBeBeforeToDate: The expiration date must be later than the effective date

leaveEntitlements.title: Time Off Entitlements
leaveEntitlements.downloadCsvModalDes: Download the CSV template, fill in the entitlements you wish to add to the organization, and then upload the completed file.
leaveEntitlements.uploadCsvModalDes: Upload the CSV template with updated employee time off information.
leaveEntitlements.emptyFileError: No records found. Please try again.
leaveEntitlements.invalidTemplateError: Invalid file. Please use the provided template.
leaveEntitlements.overrideConfirmationModalDes: You have already added entitlements for the year {{uploadingYear}}. Uploading new entitlements for this year will override the existing ones. You will not be able to revoke this decision.
leaveEntitlements.overrideConfirmationTxt: Are you sure you want to proceed?

leaveManagerEmployee.approvedLeaveRevoke: Approved time off will be revoked and notification will be sent to the employee. Time off entitlements will be updated.

leaveManagerEmployee.approveAreaLabel: Pressing enter on this button will approve the time off request.
leaveManagerEmployee.cancelAreaLabel: Pressing enter on this button will open the decline time off modal. In that modal you can decline the time off request

leaveReports.emptyScreenDescription: We couldn't find any matches for your search. Please adjust your filter criteria and try again.

leaveCarryForward.name: NAME
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardSectionDescription: Sync eligible carried forward time off balances of the entire organization to the next time off cycle.
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardSuccessToastDescription: Carried Forward Time off balances have been synced successfully.
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardFailToastDescription: Failed to sync the balances. Please try again.
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardModalDescription: This action will synchronize eligible carried forward time off balances of all employees to the next time off cycle. Note that this will impact the current time off balances of the employees. Are you sure you want to proceed?
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardTypeSelectionModalDescr: Please select the time off types that you wish to carry forward to the next time off cycle
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardUnEligibleModalTitle: No eligible time off balances to sync
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardUnEligibleModalDescript: There are no time off balances that meet the eligibility criteria for being carried forward.
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardLeaveTypesNotAvailableM: No carried forward enabled time off types available.
There are no carried forward enabled time off types available for synchronization. Please ensure that the appropriate time off types are enabled before proceeding.
leaveCarryForward.noTimeEntryDes: There are no carry forward records

pendingRequests.title: Pending Time Off Requests
pendingRequests.RequestApproveFailDescription: Failed to approve the request. Please try again.
pendingRequests.RequestDeclineFailDescription: Failed to decline the request. Please try again.
